mutants.code:
from heapq import heappush, heappop

def calculate_daily_melted_snow(N, V, T):
    heap = []
    eps = 1
    melted_volumes = []
    for i in range(N):
        ans = 0
        heappush(heap, eps + V[i])
        while heap:
            if heap[0] >= eps + T[i]:
                break
            ans += heap[0] - eps
            heappop(heap)
        ans += len(heap) * T[i]
        eps += T[i]
        melted_volumes.append(ans)
    return melted_volumes

    for i in range(N):
        ans = 0
        heappush(heap, eps - V[i])
        while heap:

                break
            ans += heap[0] - eps
            heappop(heap)
        ans += len(heap) * T[i]
        eps += T[i]

    return melted_volumes
